name: World of Warcraft Armory Discord Bot
description: Discord bot which displays notable PVE/PVP achievements and progress.

WOW_API_KEY.description: Required to make calls to the Blizzard API key, you can sign up for a key here: https://dev.battle.net/

WOW_REGION.description: The region you'd like to query, for example us or eu.

LOCALE.description: The language for your selected WoW region, for example en_US.

DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN.description: The token for your Discord bot user, you can sign up for one here: https://discordapp.com/developers/docs/intro
